text: Fabio Lanzoni (born 15 March 1959), known simply as Fabio, is an Italian- American actor, fashion model and spokesperson. He is for known his appearances as spokesman for I Can't Believe It's Not Butter! and the American Cancer Society. He was also a romance novel cover model throughout the 1980s and 1990s. His acting credits include the movies Death Becomes Her (1992), Eddie (1996), Dude, Where's My Car? (2000) and Zoolander (2001). Lanzoni was born in Milan, Lombardy. He became a citizen of the United States in 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Milan Category:American models Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Italian models Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: Fabio Lanzoni
